ComicInfo.Summary:
The Final Chapter!: Spider-Monkey has been trapped under a ton of rubble by Doc Ook and takes some time to reflect on his simian life.
To Stalk a Spider!: Kraven assumes control of Marty Blank's mind and sends the Gibbon to battle Spider-Man.
The Birth of... The Gibbon!: Inspired by Spider-Man's example, misfit Marty Blank dons an ape costume and plans to fight crime as the Gibbon, but Spider-Man mocks him, leaving him vulnerable to someone who plans to take advantage of the situation.
